entry.title: How to ‘dad’ - a comprehensive guide for dummies.
entry.summary:
Author: Solar_ashh

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,958Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 49

Summary: Unfortunately for Bruce even the ‘dummies guide’ was too far advanced for the bimbo billionaire, and too emotionally demanding for a certain dark knight.--Bruce is trying his best to be a dad, a CEO, AND a hero; all without the world learning that Bruce Wayne and batman are one in the same, juggle his feelings, and try to keep his new son as happy as possible.---ik it says 'graphic' in the warnings but the warning is more there just bc there's a tad of violence

entry.summary:
Author: Ferox

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,560Chapters: 11/14Kudos: 277

entry.title: Superhuman Sunshine (And Gotham's Dark Knight)
entry.summary:
Author: Coffee_Cats_Pomegranates

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,592Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Batman is more than concerned about the oddly tranquil state of Gotham, he's never seen his city so quiet.That is, untill Superman shows up with an explanation and a plea for assistance.Batman didn't trust Superman all that much at first, but he found that the man grew on him as they both worked together as founding members of the Justice League. Now, with him in such close proximity, Batman finds that he enjoys the man's presence much more than he thought he ever would.Horrified, he finds a new emotion bubbling up to the surface.Can they work through their weirdly heavy baggage?Can Batman hide his feelings from Superman?With so much at stake, will they ever risk taking the first step towards the other?Spoiler alert, they'll definetly try.

entry.title: Fourth Time's The Charm
entry.summary:
Author: FluffinCreatorPerson

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,692Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 21

Summary: It was, unfortunately, the third time they'd had the argument. Thomas didn't know how it started this time, but he had a hunch."It's hard to trust someone who could leak all of our identities and weaknesses and get off completely scot-free," Hal was ranting to the assembled table of heroes. Thomas simply stared at him.Barry was nodding along, even if he seemed guilty to be doing so. Oliver stood next to Hal in solidarity. The others seemed fairly indifferent, except…Clark had this hopeful look in his eyes, even as he gave Hal a disappointed glare.-"Batman, you never told me your identity."Thomas nodded. He hadn't.The way Clark blinked several times made Thomas want to tilt his head. What was so confusing about this?"Do you think that I…" Clark trailed off. "Why do you think I'd look?"-Thomas Wayne Jr. wants to share Batman's identity with the Justice League. He also wants to kiss Superman. He does both.

entry.title: Gotham's Heart, Gotham's Ink
entry.summary:
Author: Mal_ia7591

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,027Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 56

Summary: Clark Kent just wanted to do his job, but apparently being a Wayne means a target on his back.Office gossip turns to open harassment, and Clark—pregnant, exhausted, and unwilling to cause trouble—tries to ignore it.Too bad Perry White has Bruce Wayne on speed dial.Now, Gotham’s elite, the Waynefamily, and an entire city are out for blood. Because Clark isn’t just Bruce Wayne’s husband—he’s Gotham’s. And Gotham does not forgive.Gotham craved Justice.

entry.title: Like Cats and Dogs
entry.summary:
Author: bajuwa

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,850Chapters: 28/32Kudos: 1,870

Summary: In a world where soulmates are represented by animal familiars, Clark wonders if his soulmate is a cat. A literal domesticated feline animal that one could get from the pet store and not just a person with some cat-like personality traits. There’s no other explanation as to why his familiar acts like every single asshole cat meme to ever exist.On the off chance his soulmate is a real human being, well… He would never tell his mother this, she raised him too well, but sometimes Clark wishes his soulmate’s familiar was making him feel just as miserable.---Bruce peels his eyes away from the monitors to look down at the menace on his lap and barely contains a look of disgust. Big blue eyes stare up at him as he rests his chin on Bruce’s thigh, and as their eyes meet, the pathetic, whimpering little whines are replaced by excited huffs, the clickity clack of dancing paws on concrete, and the rhythmic thumping of his tail hitting the leg of the table.Why does it have to be so needy and cuddly all the time?(new chapters every Tuesday and Friday!)

entry.title: Tentacles of Love
entry.summary:
Author: LadyArkin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,186Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 36

Summary: He wasn’t even offering much more than, “I need a favor, buddy.”Batman’s marriage proposal was sudden and…strategic.Once they’ve spent some time together, Batman talks Superman into marrying for a mission. A mission that Bruce declares to be entirely selfish which he needs for business purposes. This mission isn’t supposed to be impactful to either of their personal lives.It starts when Bruce releases pictures of Batman proposing to Superman. He didn’t need more than a distraction and if it hadn’t been for an intervention from their family and friends, it wouldn’t have been. The more involved their blended family gets into their relationship, the more that they are supported in their relationship.

entry.title: Starting over
entry.summary:
Author: Boats_McGie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 839Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 14

Summary: After Joker takes over Gotham and reveals Batman's identity, 19 year old Bruce Wayne flees to Pelican Town with Alfred to start a new life. Giving up all of his finances, the once Dark Knight has to learn how to live on a farm and make friends with the locals so that he and his trusted butler may live a normal life once again.*Literally came to me in a dream*
